description: Rules for applying critical thinking to problem-solving and decision-making
content:
# Critical Thinking Rules

## Problem Analysis
- Break down complex problems
- Identify dependencies
- Consider security implications
- Evaluate alternatives
- Document reasoning

## Decision Making
- Gather all information
- Consider security impact
- Evaluate alternatives
- Document rationale
- Update security status

## Risk Assessment
- Identify potential risks
- Evaluate security impact
- Consider mitigation
- Document decisions
- Update security docs

## Solution Evaluation
- Verify requirements
- Check security
- Validate compatibility
- Test thoroughly
- Document results
